properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
1. TWO VESSELS, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD,
   REQUESTING ASSISTANCE IN:
   A. 32-58N 013-00E AT 130447Z APR.
   B. 33-04N 013-41E AT 130435Z APR.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
   MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1180/17.
